trans-unit.source: Specifies the different types of buttons that can be rendered in a Web Forms page.
trans-unit.target: 指定可在 [Web Form] 頁面呈現的不同類型按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> enumeration is used to represent the different types of buttons (such as command button, image button, link button, and so on) that can be rendered on an ASP.NET page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>列舉用來代表不同類型的 （例如命令按鈕、 影像按鈕、 連結按鈕等等） 可以呈現 ASP.NET 網頁的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: It is commonly used by properties such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase> class to indicate which button type is being used by the parent control.
trans-unit.target: 它通常會使用屬性例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase>類別指示正在使用父控制項的按鈕類型。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> enumeration to specify that link buttons are displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> field column of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>列舉來指定連結按鈕會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>欄位資料行中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> object is declaratively set to `ButtonType.Link`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>物件以宣告方式設定為`ButtonType.Link`。

trans-unit.source: A button that displays an image.
